definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)
to unstring a bow/to slacken/to relax/to loosen

sentences.english: There should be a very little mic cable slack at the mic stand base.
sentences.chinese: 這將只有麥架基座上的一小部分線的是鬆弛的。

sentences.english: Photo Gallery: Sydney Bondi Beach Sunbathing is a popular way to relax in Sydney.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼的日光浴是一個受歡迎的途徑有利於鬆弛。

sentences.english: Then the eye is relaxed for distance and the entire amount of focusing ability is available to see close.
sentences.chinese: 遠視的眼睛得以鬆弛，用全部調焦能力近看。

sentences.english: Wrap the ball of dough with greaseproof wrapper and chill it for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把和好的麪糰用保鮮膜包好，放入冰箱鬆弛30分鐘。

sentences.english: It is of medium length, neither cobby nor slack from excessive length.
sentences.chinese: 中等長度，不能因爲身體過長而變圓或鬆弛。

sentences.english: When the patient shuts up, buccinator is very flabby, reason quarrel is flagging.
sentences.chinese: 患者閉嘴時，頰肌極爲鬆弛，故口角下垂。

sentences.english: Mix until it is completely incorporated. Wrap and chill for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用保鮮膜包好入冰箱鬆弛30分鐘。

sentences.english: Shot peening is also improved the stress relaxation ability of copper alloy.
sentences.chinese: 噴丸處理亦能改善銅合金的應力鬆弛性能。

sentences.english: A study is made on Cauchy problem of compressible Eulers equations with relaxation term.
sentences.chinese: 研究具鬆弛項可壓縮的歐拉方程組柯西問題。

sentences.english: Another experiment creates a muscle relaxant.
sentences.chinese: 另一個實驗是使得肌肉鬆弛。

sentences.english: Medical characterized by catatonia especially either rigidity or extreme laxness of limbs.
sentences.chinese: 具有緊張症特徵的，尤指四肢的極端僵硬或鬆弛。

sentences.english: Stress-relaxation time becomes longer with sugar-acid ratio decreasing.
sentences.chinese: 而糖酸比越低，應力鬆弛時間越長。

sentences.english: Ill health had pouched the loose flesh under his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 健康不佳使得他眼下面的肌肉鬆弛。

sentences.english: His wide smile flaps loosely with each breath.
sentences.chinese: 他那滿面笑容隨着每次呼吸鬆弛地收放。

sentences.english: Throat showing dewlap and folds of skin to a degree termed "throatiness."
sentences.chinese: 喉嚨上有贅肉，皮膚鬆弛達到了“粗喉嚨”的程度。

sentences.english: Dynamic relaxation method as a new numerical method has been developed since 1960.
sentences.chinese: 動力鬆弛法是近十多年來提出並發展的一種數值方法。

definition: to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
to stretch taut/(of muscles etc) taut/strained/tense
